record.field:
Dear ${ctx['name']},


Please spare your valuable time and share your feedback on the Onboarding and Induction process at CSM by clicking the below link.


Click Here

Thanks & regards
% if object.env.user and object.env.user.signature: ${object.env.user.signature | safe} % endif

Dear % if ctx['mail_for'] == 'submit confirm': ${ctx['name']}, % elif ctx['mail_for'] == 'reassign confirm': ${ctx['name']}, %endif


% if ctx['mail_for'] == 'submit confirm':

Your response has been submitted successfully.

Employee Name: ${object.emp_id.name}
Department Name: ${object.dept_id.name}
Designation: ${object.deg_id.name}
Remarks: ${object.remark_reviewer}
% elif ctx['mail_for'] == 'reassign confirm':

Your scores for HR/IT/Know Your Company Induction assessment is below benchmark. Hence it has been rescheduled. Please login and appear the assessment again.

%endif

Thanks & regards
% if object.env.user and object.env.user.signature: ${object.env.user.signature | safe} % endif

Dear Reviewer ,


The below employee has shared the onboarding & Induction feedback. Please review this in onboarding module.


Employee Name: ${object.emp_id.name}
Department Name: ${object.dept_id.name}
Designation: ${object.deg_id.name}
Status: ${object.status_feedback}


Thanks & regards
% if object.env.user and object.env.user.signature: ${object.env.user.signature | safe} % endif

Dear % if ctx['mail_for'] == 'onboard confirm': ${ctx['name']}, %endif


% if ctx['mail_for'] == 'onboard confirm':

The remarks for your feedback has been submitted by the reviewer.

Employee Name: ${object.emp_id.name}
Department Name: ${object.dept_id.name}
Designation: ${object.deg_id.name}
Status: ${object.status_feedback}
Remarks: ${object.remark_reviewer}
% endif


Thanks & regards
% if object.env.user and object.env.user.signature: ${object.env.user.signature | safe} % endif

Dear ${ctx['emp_name']},

Please click on the below link to appear the Induction Assessment.


Click Here

Note:

Please leave your feedback after completion of every Assessment.

Thank You.

Dear All ,

${ctx['emp_name']} has completed the ${ctx['assessment']} and has submitted. Please login to verify.


Thank You.

Dear ${ctx['emp_name']} ,

Congratulations !


You have successfully completed the assessment.Kindly follow the below path to download your POSH Certificate.


My Profile ---> My Certificate----> Posh Certificate----> Download


Thank You.

span.p: Please submit the Onboarding & Induction Feedback

record.field: ${ctx['emailfrom'] if ctx['emailfrom'] else object.user_id.email if object.user_id.email else ''}
${ctx['emailfrom'] if ctx['emailfrom'] else object.user_id.email if object.user_id.email else ''}

Hello ${ctx['applicantname']},

${object.user_id.partner_id.name} invited you for the induction ${object.name} meeting.

Induction Details

% if object.online_meeting: %endif % if object.location_id: %endif
Date ${format_tz(object.kw_start_meeting_date, format='%d-%b-%Y')}
Time ${datetime.datetime.strptime(object.kw_start_meeting_time,"%H:%M:%S").strftime("%I:%M %p")}
Duration ${('%dH:%dM' % (object.duration,(object.duration*60)%60))}
Meeting URL % if object.online_meeting == 'zoom': ${object.online_meeting_join_url} % else: ${object.other_meeting_url} % endif
Where % if object.meeting_room_id: ${object.meeting_room_id.name} % if object.meeting_room_id.floor_name: (${object.meeting_room_id.floor_name}) % endif % else: Virtual % endif

Dear ${ctx['applicantname']} ,
% if ctx['mail_for'] == 'Offline':

Please find below the details of the Induction Plan:

% endif % if ctx['mail_for'] == 'virtual':

Please find below the Virtual Induction details :

% endif
% if ctx['mail_for'] == 'Offline': % if ctx['meeting_link']: % endif % if ctx['meeting_room']: % endif
Meeting Link: ${ctx['meeting_link']}
Meeting Room: ${ctx['meeting_room']}(${ctx['floor_name']})
% endif
% for rec in ctx['record']: % if rec.inductor_name_id: % endif
Induction Name: ${rec.type_induction_id.name}
Induction Type: ${rec.induction_type}
Induction Date: ${format_tz(rec.induction_date, tz='UTC', format='%d-%b-%Y')}
Induction Time: ${object.get_adjusted_induction_time(rec.induction_date)}
Inductor Name: % if rec.inductor_name_id: ${rec.inductor_name_id.name} % endif
--------------------------------
% endfor % if ctx['remarks']: % endif
Remarks: ${ctx['remarks']}

Please follow the instruction for the Virtual Induction.

Login Tendrils -----> Skill Assessment Module ------> Onboarding Induction Assessment Menu --------> Induction Details -----> View details.


Thank You.

Dear ${ctx['emp_name']},

Please click on the below link to appear the POSH Induction Assessment.


Click Here

Thank You.
